metadata.rationale: Extracted from canonical script and scene co-occurrence data.

data.description: Liliane is the Saks Fifth Avenue sales manager — a slight, 60-something woman who is exquisitely coiffed and from the pre-plastic surgery generation. She wears her age gracefully and is defined by her graciousness, warmth, and professional accommodation toward wealthy clients. She operates with quiet elegance, managing the private after-hours shopping experience with practiced efficiency.
data.dialogue_summary: Liliane speaks sparingly but warmly. She greets Cassandra with familiarity, welcomes Dante graciously, confirms her professional pleasure in serving them, and closes the encounter by offering to deliver Dante's new wardrobe and original clothing — a small but telling gesture of thoroughness and care.

explicit_evidence.quote: It was lovely to meet you, Dante. Any friend of Ms. Constantine is a friend of ours. Please come see us for anything you need.
explicit_evidence.source_scene: EXT. SAK'S FIFTH AVE FRONT ENTRANCE - CONTINUOUS

explicit_evidence.quote: Of course, Ms. Constantine. It will be my absolute pleasure.
explicit_evidence.source_scene: EXT. SAK'S FIFTH AVE FRONT ENTRANCE - CONTINUOUS

explicit_evidence.quote: Liliane shakes Dante's hand with both her hands. She has pressed her personal business card into Dante's hand.
explicit_evidence.source_scene: EXT. SAK'S FIFTH AVE FRONT ENTRANCE - CONTINUOUS

explicit_evidence.quote: LILIANE, (slight, 60-something, exquisitely coiffed female), is from the pre-plastic surgery generation and wears her age gracefully.
explicit_evidence.source_scene: EXT. SAK'S FIFTH AVE FRONT ENTRANCE - CONTINUOUS

inferred_traits.rationale: Liliane manages a private after-hours shopping session, handles a black Visa card without comment, and executes Cassandra's instructions without question, suggesting long-practiced professional discretion.

She personally guides Dante through a full makeover, coordinates clothing, shoes, make-up, and hair, and even thinks to offer delivery of Dante's original clothing — demonstrating thorough client care.
Her immediate recognition of Cassandra, use of 'Ms. Constantine,' and seamless execution of the visit imply a long-standing professional relationship built on trust.
Her farewell to Dante — pressing her personal card into her hand and standing at the door smiling and nodding — goes beyond professional courtesy and suggests sincere warmth.

data.name: ONE

relationships.evidence: Liliane immediately recognizes Cassandra, addresses her as 'Ms. Constantine,' accepts her black Visa card without hesitation, and executes her styling directives without question.
relationships.relationship_type: Long-standing professional service relationship; trusted vendor to a wealthy client

relationships.evidence: Liliane takes Dante's arm, guides her through the makeover, presses her personal card into Dante's hand, and stands at the door smiling as Dante departs.
relationships.relationship_type: Newly introduced client; warm professional acquaintance

scene_presence: EXT. SAK'S FIFTH AVE FRONT ENTRANCE - CONTINUOUS
